title: Ira Shopify Template
body:
Ira â€“ Street is the second template from the Ira Shopify themes collection. This theme has a highly visible heading and a full-screen background images. Product category pages feature large photography and short preview of the full product listing page. Overall, this theme can work very well for almost any type of eCommerce store.

Check it out [here](https://themes.shopify.com/themes/ira/styles/ecstatic)!
